title: [Veythorne Manor, Gardens]
description: The intricate, sweeping architecture of the manor can be glimpsed between the gaps of the dark ivy that twine about the tall gates enclosing it.  The ivory-hued cobblestoned path curves around a small stack of ancient grey rocks, a small stream of water trickling down them like a miniature waterfall.  Flame-bright tulips line the edges of the water, their vivid hue brilliant against the sunlight.

The intricate, sweeping architecture of the manor can be glimpsed between the gaps of the dark ivy that twine about the tall gates enclosing it.  The ivory-hued cobblestoned path curves around a small stack of ancient grey rocks, a small stream of water trickling down them like a miniature waterfall.  Flame-bright tulips line the edges of the water, their vivid hue muted against the starlight.
